text: 18|16|(avar an'yean'yam parannu:) avareyum allahu olike avar aradhicc keantirikkunnatineyum ninnal vittealinna sthitikk ninnal a guhayil abhayam prapicc kealluka. ninnalute raksitav avanre karunyattil ninn ninnalkk visalamayi nalkukayum, ninnalute karyattil sekaryamerppetuttittarikayum ceyyunnatanâ€Œ
